oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Producer: Texas Cattle Feeders Association
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: McDonald, Richard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: medicated feed
Mixer-Feeder Compliance Program
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We commend the Taskforce for developing the new second generation approach to medicated feed regulations. We respectfully request that consideration be given to our proposal for a Mixer-Feeder Compliance Program. This program would permit FDA 'sand the State'sresources to be utilized to accomplish compliance of the commercial feed industry and would not diminish benefits to consumers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1979; 25-27
